excerpt.en: Since I had started taking pictures with my camera, I noticed that I'm addicted to it. Whenever I'm free, I'll be thinking whether I should go out and take some pictures. Today is Saturday, the weather is clear, it is the perfect time for outdoor. I drove to Federath, and walked along the road on the hills for the whole afternoon.
excerpt.zh: 自从开始用相机拍照片之后，我发现我好像有点上瘾了。每天闲下来的时候我就会想着要出去走一走，拍两张照片回来。今天是周六，天气非常好，正好是出行的好机会，所以我就开车去了Federath，沿着丘陵上的小路慢慢地像散步一样走了一下午。

content.en: Since I had started taking pictures with my camera, I noticed that I'm addicted to it. Whenever I'm free, I'll be thinking whether I should go out and take some pictures. Today is Saturday, the weather is clear, it is the perfect time for outdoor. I drove to Federath, and walked along the road on the hills for the whole afternoon.
content.zh: 自从开始用相机拍照片之后，我发现我好像有点上瘾了。每天闲下来的时候我就会想着要出去走一走，拍两张照片回来。今天是周六，天气非常好，正好是出行的好机会，所以我就开车去了Federath，沿着丘陵上的小路慢慢地像散步一样走了一下午。

description.zh: 看上去很复古的电线杆

description.en: I've struggled with the framing for a long time, and finally decided to keep both
description.zh: 我纠结到底要怎样的构图纠结了好久，最后还是决定两张照片都留着了

description.en: The curly trunk and branches look quite aesthetic
description.zh: 卷曲的树枝和树干看起来很有艺术感

description.en: The logs pilled up at the roadside
Sunlight in the forest has never been boring
description.zh: 穿过树林的阳光怎么看都看不厌

content.en: At the end of the hill road, I was about to reaching the parking lot. There I've seen an animal walking along the street. I thought it was a cat at the beginning, but it turned out to be a little fox. I dragged out my camera immediately and try to catch it on photos. Although the lens is reaching its limit, but the small creature on the picture is still very blurry. I tried to reach the little fox slowly; however the fox noticed me and quickly jumped away. What a pitty! I'll definitely need a telescope lens if I want to do some serious bird or wildlife shooting in the future.
content.zh: 山路快走完，快要回到停车场的时候，我突然发现路边上有一只小动物在走。一开始的时候我还以为是一只猫，结果仔细一看居然是一直小小的狐狸。我连忙掏出相机来照，但是因为我没有长焦头，所以把焦距拉到极限了之后还是没能拍到一张清晰的照片。等我慢慢接近小狐狸的时候，它发现了我，三两下就跳走了，还真是可惜。看来如果以后想要拍鸟或者是野生动物的话，一个长焦镜头是必须的了。

description.en: The little fox is very blurry on the picture
description.zh: 照片上的小狐狸模糊成一团
